General.Name: Ittifak Holding AS
General.Description: Ittifak Holding A.S. engages in the food, construction, real estate investment, machinery, agriculture, and animal husbandry businesses in Turkey. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Selçuklu, Turkey.
General.Address: Musalla Baglar Mahallesi Kule Caddesi K, Selçuklu, Turkey, 42060
